content.title: What is a Font Generator?
content.text: A font generator is an online tool that transforms plain text into styled text using Unicode characters. It allows you to create beautiful, distinctive text styles without installing fonts or using design software. Font generators are perfect for social media posts, design projects, and anywhere you want to add visual flair to your text.

faq.a: Toolaze supports multiple font styles including cursive, fancy, bold, italic, gothic, tattoo, calligraphy, old english, 3D, script, and many more. You can preview all available styles in real-time.

faq.q: Is this font generator really free?
faq.a: Yes! Toolaze is 100% free with no ads, no registration, and no hidden fees. All font generation happens in your browser.

faq.q: Can I use these fonts on social media?
faq.a: Yes, you can copy and paste the generated fonts to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, Discord, and other platforms that support Unicode characters.

faq.q: Are my texts uploaded to a server?
faq.a: No! All font generation happens locally in your browser using JavaScript. Your text never leaves your device, ensuring complete privacy.
Toolaze generates styled text that you can copy and paste. We don't provide downloadable font files (.ttf, .otf), but you can use the generated text anywhere.
